title: Amount of Research Objectives
text: Research can have multiple objective goals that it hopes to achieve.

title: Focus and Scope
text: Questions tend to be more specific to the data while objectives tend to be broader.

title: Relation to Hypothesis
text: Some objectives may relate to a hypothesis but some may be more exploratory or more general.

title: Research Goals
text: A research objective is reflective of the overarching goals of the research, and do not always have to be formatted as a question.
